title: Installation issue: hypre@2.14.0 fails due to superlu-dist patch
body:
### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack install hypre@2.14.0 % gcc@4.9.4
==> Installing hypre
==> Searching for binary cache of hypre
==> Warning: No Spack mirrors are currently configured
==> No binary for hypre found: installing from source
==> Using cached archive: /home/balos1/.local/src/spack/var/spack/cache/hypre/hypre-2.14.0.tar.gz
==> Staging archive: /home/balos1/.local/src/spack/var/spack/stage/hypre-2.14.0-crfkaqduba4pyg3mjxlyb6yekrdeynum/v2.14.0.tar.gz
==> Created stage in /home/balos1/.local/src/spack/var/spack/stage/hypre-2.14.0-crfkaqduba4pyg3mjxlyb6yekrdeynum
1 out of 1 hunk FAILED -- saving rejects to file src/lib/Makefile.rej
==> Patch /home/balos1/.local/src/spack/var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/hypre/superlu-dist-link.patch failed.
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 1:
    '/usr/bin/patch' '-s' '-p' '1' '-i' '/home/balos1/.local/src/spack/var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/hypre/superlu-dist-link.patch' '-d' '.'
```

### Platform and user environment

Please report your OS here:
```commandline
$ uname -a 
Linux tux419 3.10.0-957.5.1.el7.x86_64 #1 SMP Wed Dec 19 10:46:58 EST 2018 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux
```

This started happening after #10985 which added the superlu-dist variant to the hypre package. It works fine when installing `hypre@2.15:`. Im guessing the patch for superlu-dist that is applied should be conditionally applied based on the hypre version.

@balay
